channel.title: How to load a sample from SD card to RAM?
channel.description:
Hey, I feel a bit stupid for not being able to figure this out, but... how do I load a sample from the SD-card in my Axoloti into SDRAM? I've figured out how to record a sample from audio in to a table and play that back, but I wanna load a sample straight from the SD-card instead.
Any help appreciated!

item.title: How to load a sample from SD card to RAM?
item.dc:creator: @surething
item.description:
@surething wrote:

Just as I post this I find a similar thread which helped me figure it out, hehe.

Here's a screenshot in case someone googles this in the future!

loadsample.png1023x360 19.2 KB

Read full topic
